title: Tricuspid regurgitation in the context of severe left-sided valvular disease: Patients characteristics and outcome
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Davide Margonato, Giacomo Ingallina, Martina Belli, Annamaria Tavernese, Gianluca Ricchetti, Francesco Ancona, Stefano Stella, Federico Biondi, Giorgio Fiore, Michele De Bonis, Francesco Maisano, Yan Topilsky, Eustachio Agricola
